transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haanji, hello. Hello, ji good afternoon sir, Uzair baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se. Yogesh ji baat kar rahe hai na aap?
Customer: Haan boliye sir.
Executive: Ji ji, sir ek toh ji jo aap mujhe WhatsApp pe bheje hai woh kya saari buyleads ke saath ho raha hai?
Customer: Sabke saath, sabke saath ho raha hai wohi toh bata raha hu aapko. Woh aata hai toh unko open kiya toh turant aa jaata hai woh, yeh toh nahi ho gaya. Are aaj ka nahi, pichle do-teen mahine se waise ho raha hai, mai aapko wohi toh bata raha hu.
Executive: Ek baar sir aap Google Meet pe aayenge? Abhi mai aapko link bheja hai, ek baar Google Meet pe aaiye phir dekhta hu.
Customer: Nahi nahi, abhi toh mai lunch ke liye ja raha hu. Achha. Turant toh possible nahi hai, matlab aadhe ghante mein aapko le lu.
Executive: Possible hai.
Customer: Mere ko aap 2 baje phone kijiye. 2:15 baje.
Executive: Sir 2 se 3 thoda lunch time rehta hai, toh 3 baje aap free ho jayenge kya?
Customer: Free hai lekin jo bhi hai. Aur aapne check kiya kya mera woh plan ka?
Executive: Haan woh woh maine check kiya hai, aapka invoice bhi check kiya hai sir. PI jo hota hai, Performa invoice. Toh usme sir aapka kahi bhi nahi likha hua hai sir.
Customer: Kya nahi likha hua?
Executive: Ki aapka jo extra ek month milega woh kahi bhi nahi likha hua hai sir usme.
Customer: Sir mai extra month ki baat kidhar kar raha hu?
Executive: Aap yeh baat kar rahe hai na ki aapka jo hai woh April tak hona chahiye.
Customer: Sir aap yeh baat kar rahe hai. Mera 41,000 ka package hai. 41407 se yeh ek saal ke liye yeh barabar hai. Clear hai na aapko, yeh toh cheez clear hai na?
Executive: Pehle boliye sir phir mai aapko samjhata hu.
Customer: Haan toh mera already aapne March ka jo month ka hai woh February end mein paisa kaat liya hai. Toh mai already aapko 3540 aapko diya hai. Theek hai?
Executive: Ab mai aapko Yogesh ji batau, jo yeh package hota hai ek saal ka hota hai. 45,000 plus GST.
Customer: Yeh yeh, yeh suniye, mai aapko clear bolu, aap mere ko baar baar repeatedly mat sunaiye. Nahi toh mere ko woh time pe jo mere ko offer kiya tha na usko connect kijiye.
Executive: Toh sir offer diya hoga woh written mein bhi toh diya hoga, invoice jo PI aapko bheja hoga.
Customer: Mere ko written mein dene ki jarurat nahi hai, aapko automatic carry forward ho jayega, I trust him.
Executive: Sir mai aapko kal bhi wohi bata raha tha.
Customer: Trust ki baat mai maan raha hu, unhone agar bola hai uske liye.
Customer: Sab chhod dijiye sir, chhod dijiye, ignore kijiye. Abhi mere ko ek baat bataiye, mere ko agar plan cancel karne ka hai toh mere ko refund milega kya?
Executive: Sir plan toh cancel nahi hota hai. Baaki aapko jo dikkat aa rahi hai buylead mein aa rahi hai, business mein jo problem aa rahi hai.
Customer: Yeh aap log paisa loot rahe ho toh mere ko wapas kaise milega abhi? Aapne ek toh jhooth bolke mere ko fasa diya, plan bhi de diya. Barabar hai, maine aap logo ke upar trust kiya. Abhi aap mere ko woh toh woh contact karwaiye jo number se mere ko inhone offer diya tha.
Executive: Aapki baat mai maan raha hu ki agar aapko aise kiya hai unhone toh galat kiya hai. Lekin aap mujhe yeh bataye sir agar Performa invoice mein hota likha hua kyuki hum kise bhi dete hai. Aage bhi hum agar ek mahina agar aisa karte hai koi bhi back karke toh usme likha hua hota.
Customer: Suniye na, aap jaan boojh ke ek toh baat manipulate kar rahe ho. Mai aapko teen-teen baar bata raha hu.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir, aap suniye, suniye meri baat toh samajh lijiye. Mai aapko kya bol raha hu, aapke logo ne mere ko bataya yeh cheeze karne ki jarurat nahi hai, aapko written dene ki jarurat nahi hai, aapko automatic milega kyuki aapne already month mein maara hai.
Executive: Sir iska jo package hota hai woh 45,000 plus GST hota hai.
Customer: Toh aap samajh mein nahi aa raha hai, mere ko aise kar rahe ho samajh mein nahi aa raha hai aapko. Aap ek kaam kijiye sir, mere ko hai na khali woh number nikaal ke dijiye. Jo do-teen log the na woh jo haath pair pad rahe the mere ko, aise jaise bhikhari aate hai na.
Executive: Mere paas mein toh number nahi hai, agar hoga possible mai nikaal ke ek baar de dunga, agar possible hua toh.
Customer: Nahi dijiye, nahi toh mujhe kuch legal action lena hai toh kaise le sakte hai mujhe bataiye.
Executive: Kya cheez?
Customer: Kuch legal aur kar sakta hu kya mai isliye mera jo ek mahine ka paisa hai toh wapas aana chahiye nahi toh plan badhana chahiye.
Executive: Plan ka sir yeh hai ki jo aapko plan liya hai aapne utni service aapko proper di ja rahi hai, maine pura kal ek uske baad.
Customer: Service toh proper mil hi nahi rahi hai, woh service ka chhod dijiye. Service toh side mein chhod dijiye.
Executive: Haan toh service aapko pata chalega.
Customer: Mujhe jo paisa extra woh kaise milega, woh bataiye. Mere ko woh bataiye. Service kya aap bhaar mein jaane do, baad mein baat karenge. Mera jo paisa gaya hai usko kaise return mein milega? Jo mere ko mere ko bataya gaya hai woh paisa kaise milega?
Executive: Sir aapko fasaaya mai maan raha hu lekin aap sir mujhe toh written mein dikhaiye, ab mai aise thodi sir aage agar koi cheez forward karunga, aap mujhe dikhayenge tabhi toh mai forward karunga.
Customer: Suniye suniye, aapko hindi samajh mein aata hai?
Executive: Sir aap businessman hai.
Customer: Suniye na suniye, mere ko aapko yes or no mein jawab dijiye. Toh mai aapko clearly batata hu ki aapke jo log the, aap suniye, kaan khol ke suniye, unhone mere ko bataya tha ki written mein dene ki jarurat nahi hai, aapka already one mahine ka package woh hai yeh carry forward ho jayega aur aapko automatically aapko aapke jo window hoti hai IndiaMART ki usme dikhaya jayega. Abhi mai aapko chauthi-paachvi baar bol raha hu, mere ko written mein diya nahi, maine unke upar trust kiya. Toh abhi iske upar mere ko aap solution bataiye, aap baar baar mujhe woh mat ghumaiye.
Executive: Yogesh ji aapne trust dikhaya mai aapki kadar karta hu us baat ki. Lekin aap mujhe yeh bataye without written mein mai kuch kar sakta hu kya? Nahi kar sakta na. Aap company chala rahe hai sir itni badi chala rahe hai, aap khud sir itne saari cheezo se known honge agar koi bhi cheez aapke paas written mein nahi hai toh aap kaise uspe action lenge? Agar mere paas.
Customer: Iska matlab yeh hai ki aap samajh lo ki aap chutiya bana rahe ho, fraud kar rahe ho customer ke saath.
Executive: Sir mai dikha bhi dunga, sir mai dikha bhi dunga jinko hum extra dete hai ek mahina package agar do-teen saal ka lete hai offer chalta hota hai usme toh woh written mein jaati hai yeh cheez.
Customer: Ek kaam kijiye na aap hai na abhi kya hai na mere paas hai na agar mera pehla wala mobile rehta toh mai aapko record bhi dikha sakta. But mai abhi thoda mobile change kiya hai, mujhe khali woh number mil sakta hai kya jinke saath mera baat hua tha?
Executive: Uske liye mai ek baar try karta hu agar mujhe mil jaata hai mai aapko jarur dunga. Baaki agar aapke sir recording hai toh recording aap mujhe share kariye. Kuch toh aap share karenge.
Customer: Woh aisa document police station mein jaata hai na aapke paas kyu aata? Woh toh mera mobile purana wala hai, mai wohi toh aapko samjha raha hu.
Executive: Sir without proof mai kaise aage forward karunga, kuch mujhse bhi toh.
Customer: Nahi nahi sir yeh bahut bada trap kiya aapke logo ne sir, bahut bada trap kiya. Woh chutiya bana rahe hai, woh matlab.
Executive: Aap sir choti company nahi chala rahe hai na, aap sir bahut badi company chala rahe hai aur saari cheezo se aap known honge sir. Aise koi cheez aap sir purchase thodi kar lete hai.
Customer: Yeh jitna karta hu na, abhi ek hi cheez batata hu, koi bhi cheez hai na bharose ke upar chalti hai, business bhi ho. Aap bhi bharose ke upar chala rahe ho toh bharose ke upar.
Executive: Aap bhi koi cheez offer karte honge. Nahi nahi aap bhi sir koi offer karte honge, koi cheez dete honge toh uska invoice generate karte honge na, maal agar wagera mangaa rahe hai.
Customer: Toh aapne invoice diya hai, aap mere ko ek baat bataiye, chalo aap invoice pe baat kar rahe hai, invoice invoice kar rahe ho na, aap kya bolte ho mere ko kya plan diya aapne mere ko aapke IndiaMART ne mere ko?
Executive: Aapne aapne PI dekha tha sir, Performa invoice.
Customer: Mai aapko simple bol raha hu abhi, aapke IndiaMART ne mere ko kya plan diya tha TrustSeal ka?
Executive: Woh kya plan diya hoga, ek saal ka hi toh diya hoga sir.
Customer: Haan toh mere ko waha pe aap bataiye, ek saal ka diya hai, waha pe mere ko bataiye kaha pe 45,000 likha hai, chaliye aapke hisaab se jaate hai.
Customer: Invoice jo diya hai mere ko, tax invoice mere ko open kijiye. Waha pe bataiye mere ko kaha pe 45,000 likha hai.
Executive: Ek baar sir jo aapka invoice hai Performa invoice woh aap open kariye.
Customer: Mere saamne, mere saamne 6 March 2023 invoice number 1815745970. Woh aapne show 41477 pay kiya hai woh total adjustment ke saath kiya hai jo 3540 aapne February ka kiya tha woh isme include kariye sir.
Customer: Mere ko bas woh bataiye, idhar likha hai kya include kiya hua hai woh?
Executive: Aapka mail pe aaya hoga na usme bataya hoga sir.
Customer: Aapke jo senior hai na unko call pe le lijiye. Mai aapko simple kya puch raha hu, aapne waha pe kya likha hai IndiaMART web service TS combo one year, theek hai? Waha pe unhone likha hai ki February ka adjust kiya hai?
Executive: Theek hai mai call karwata hu aapko senior mein se, theek hai?
Customer: Yeh mere ko actually dijiye abhi, chhod do, khana chhod do. Mere liye ek ek kyunki mai jab 4 din kaam karta hu tab jaake mera woh net pe aata hai.
Executive: Mai senior se baat karta hu woh aapko call karte hai, right?
Customer: Nahi nahi sir yeh time pass nahi chahiye mere ko, ek toh mere ko woh cheez chahiye, ek toh aap turant clear kar do nahi toh mere ko bata dijiye kaise karna hai woh yeh kar leta hu baaki ke mere tarike se.
Executive: Are sir sun toh lijiye woh khud aapko call karenge, unhone kiya bhi tha aapko subah ke time pe kiya tha 12:14 pe lekin aapne call disconnect kar diya unka.
Customer: Woh mere ko call nahi aaya tha kuch, mere ko call aaya tha toh?
Executive: Aaya hoga.
Customer: Bilkul nahi, bilkul nahi aaya tha. Abhi aap bataiye na chalo na yaar mai aapke tarike se ja raha hu, aap bhi nahi bata pa rahe ho mere ko. Aap log chutiya bana rahe ho, fraud kar rahe ho na aap bhi nahi bata pa rahe ho. Aap bolte ho na 45 okay, invoice mein dikhao mere ko, dikhao invoice mere ko 45 ka.
Executive: Intezaar toh kariye aap thoda sa.
Customer: Theek hai. Invoice dikhao na, 45 ka invoice dikhao na, mai wohi toh puch raha hu aapko.
Executive: Yogesh ji mujhe ek baat bataye aapne mujhe kal kaha tha maine aaj call kiya ya nahi kiya aapko?
Customer: Are aap kar rahe ho toh aise kyu bol rahe the mere ko proof karke do mai paisa nahi dunga toh service toh lunga hi na.
Executive: Are toh mai usi ko toh solution karwaunga aapko.
Customer: Kya baat kar rahe ho mere ko call kiya mere ko call kiya, chee sir aapke bahut saare managers hai na, kuch aapko nahi kaam karna toh chhod do dusre kisi ko bol do.
Customer: Aapke
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund for plan cancellation.

- Claims extra month promised not reflected.

- Alleges miscommunication and potential fraud.



Resolution:

- Executive checked invoice, no extra month mentioned.

- Asked customer to share recording as proof.

- Promised a call from senior executive.



Next Steps: 

- Senior executive will call the customer.



Alert (If Any):

refund, fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, invoice, trustseal, buyleads
